meta.title: Masjid Hadi Hasan Faqeeh - Bogor, Indonesia
meta.description: Masjid Hadi Hasan Faqeeh - Islamic worship and activity center in Bogor, Indonesia. Prayer times, Islamic studies, and religious activities.

hero.tagline: "Indeed, the mosques are for Allah, so do not invoke anyone along with Allah."

about.title: Masjid Hadi Hasan Faqeeh
about.description: Masjid Hadi Hasan Faqeeh is an Islamic worship and activity center located in Panorama Lido residential complex, Bogor, Indonesia. Established with the spirit of becoming a comfortable house of Allah for all Muslims to perform worship and gain religious knowledge.
about.visionText: To become a prosperous mosque, bustling with congregation, and serving as a center for nurturing Muslims with noble character according to the Quran and Sunnah.
missionItems: Hold regular Islamic studies and lectures
Nurture the young generation through Quran education
